name: Escape From Ravenhearst (Full)
description:
Return once more to the haunted grounds of Ravenhearst Manor to uncover new details about this poignant saga! You lived through their side of the story—now live through his! Experience the story through Charles' eyes… what you find could very well be the final chapter of this riveting story—if you escape.

☆☆☆☆☆ Features ☆☆☆☆☆

✓ Return to the manor for a psychological thriller!
✓ Get special features in the Collector's Edition!
✓ Morphing objects, new eerie scenes, and haunting puzzles to explore!
